name: P Charming Photos
text: Blaze pizza is fast fired in a super hot open flame oven. Everything is made to order right in front of you with fresh ingredients and cooks in 180 seconds. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Passalaqua
text: It‚Äôs just OK. It‚Äôs better than Dominos and Pizza Hut but not better than some of the local NY style pizzerias in town. I like a simple pie so I just got pepperoni. I don‚Äôt like a ton of toppings. For a thin crust pizza it was thicker than I expected and the crust was way too soft.

name: Doris Catlow
text: I ordered the pizza a day ahead of when I needed it.  For the time I needed it.  When I went to pick it up, I had to wait an additional 20 minutes.  I got a song and dance about staff calling off. I understand.  But the thing is,  I ordered ‚Ä¶More

name: Rebecca Griggers
text: This place is great! I have never been and the staff was so helpful and friendly. I was able to watch them make my pizza, ask for more topping which didn't cost extra (that's hard to find), and it was ready so fast - oh, and it was delicious!! I highly recommend!

name: Josethebanker
text: Look this Pizza place deserve a 3.5 star not a 3. The pizza it's done super fast that's the reason it's called blazed pizza. My wife order the pizza and we were outside and before 4 minutes, while getting the sodas, the pizzas were done. ‚Ä¶More

name: Shayler Levine
text: Pretty good pizza, wish it had more sauce on it. Good flavors and perfect cooked dough (not undercooked or too crispy). The BBQ sauce was a good amount and perfect and not too much. Would recommend to a friend.

name: Grace Hucks
text: We enjoyed some amazing Blaze pizza on Friday night. I am currently pregnant, so my husband waited in line while I sat down. The dining room attendant, Jonathan, was absolutely amazing! He made sure I was taken care of and even brought me a ‚Ä¶More

name: William James
text: Was waiting for them to put a blaze down here in fort Myers so glad they finally did! Fast and friendly service, and the pizza is always great every time! Defiantly recommend to anyone!

name: Terry Beard
text: Went for the first time last night, and order to go. It was busy and it took a little longer then I thought. With that said IT WAS BUSY AND EVERYONE LOOKED AS IF THEY WERE ENJOYING IT.  It was worth the wait. I am impressed. This is way better than Dominoes, and Papa Johns. Young staff but they were respectful.

name: Britney Snyder
text: Just wanna shout out to an amazing staff!!! This is now my favorite pizza place! I asked for all of their names because of the incredible customer service i got (extremely informative and learned some history about blaze) Thank you so much ‚Ä¶More

name: Goddess Mana
text: The manager is amazing. This is how successful business is run. There staff is hard working and do an amazing job. The food is amazing. I am filled with gratitude for all of you who work here. In my opinion you are the best pizza in town. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brooke Safferman
text: Such friendly service, very clean, delicious drink options, the pizza is fantastic (I highly recommend the build-your-own creation!), and the chocolate chip cookie with sea salt is incredibly delicious! Can't wait to return again soon!üòÅ

name: Mike Wz
text: We are happy you are in Ft Myers! My son and I enjoyed our time at your store on Grand Opening day! The food was plentiful and delicious. The store was very clean and constantly being sanitized. We love that we can get a great meal, made to ‚Ä¶More

name: Gary Grosser
text: Really fast service and a lot of toppings to choose from. Pizza is cooked within 3 minutes and brought to the bake table if you don't want to wait for it. ‚Ä¶More

name: Clayton Blackwell
text: I‚Äôve been excited to try this place for lunch. Ordered it before leaving work through the website, got to the drive through in 10-15 minutes. My pizza was ready to go and it was perfect. Got a basic BYO 11‚Äù pepperoni with red sauce, ‚Ä¶More

name: Helen Baxter
text: What a great addition to our local fast-casual food scene! Blaze has always used quality ingredients and with dough being made fresh every day, who could complain! This is only their second day in operation (7-14-20) but they are drawing a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jetster360
text: It's great, you can make your own pizza, refill your drinks, quick and easy service and you end up with a delicious meal.

name: cathy smith
text: My pizza is always good here! This time I finally got to have the dough knots and brownie...... and they were fabulous too. Great visit. Love this place

name: Rachel Evans
text: It has been hard to find a place that has a gluten free crust and this place has gluten free and a cauliflower crust that it gf too! And it's delicious! I can have pizza again!!! Great food, friendly people, and I love the patio!! Come check this place out! Yummmmmmmmm!

name: Curtis Feller
text: Amazing service and food. Always worth the time and money. Need more in the area like it

name: Michael Walters
text:
Great prices good food excellent service
Loved the salad!

name: Dominic Pryor
text: This pizza is amazing! My son loves pizza and even he said it‚Äôs the best he ever had( he‚Äôs had a lot ) they even do keto! Our Friday pizza nights will continue to come from here now! Thank you Blaze pizza for putting one in Fort Myers! Highly recommend

name: jay tyme
text: Amazing pizza place. They can make you vegan friendly pizza aswell! Cant beat it!

name: JONI MONTGOMERY
text: Good pizza Nd actually  had drinks! Very clean

name: Dennise Davila
text: Delicious pizza! Great customer service! Our family will definitely be back!

name: M D
text: Beautiful, new facility and friendly staff which is why I‚Äôm giving it 2 stars. But it‚Äôs all about the pizza, right? And mine was AWFUL. Standard cheese pizza and it was disgusting. The sauce was comparable to lunchables and the cheese was gooey (not in a good way). Sorry, won‚Äôt be returning. Disappointed.

name: Taste of SWFL
text: Clean, attractive dining area where you can watch the pizzas being prepared in the wood-burning oven. Pick your own cheese(s) and toppings from the displayed options, just like you'd find at Chipotle. They even have some healthy pizza crust ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy Neaher
text: Best pizza I have ever tried. They have good service, nice people, and MUCH MORE! I 100% reccomend going here.

name: K Mur the Gamer
text: Great vegan pizza!! The vegan cheese is really delicious and so is the chorizo. The staff has been very friendly and accommodating both times I have been there. ‚Ä¶More

name: J Berna
text: We used to go to Sarasota Blaze Pizza and we are so happy to see you here in Fort Myers. First meal today and it was a great experience. Keep up the good work, quality of food and cleanliness. Please make WiFi easier to access for guest.

name: Aura Ramos
text: LISTEN... I GOT KETO CRUST .. this taste UHHHHH MAZING for it to taste keto !!! My go to place from now on without a doubt !!!!!!

name: Josh Sorenson
text: Really love the food here, they do have some process/staffing issues to work out. The other night I ordered, got there 15 minutes after my order was supposed to be ready and was told my food wasn't ready yet. Ended up waiting 40+ minutes ‚Ä¶More

text: I've ordered from the Fort Myers location twice now.  It is ok.  I say it's ok because the pizza I ordered, the new blazin chicken was flavorful.  But that was it.  Both times I've gotten it, it's been ice cold.  Not sure its because of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer D
text: Best individual pizzas, ever! I love that you can customize everything. Cheese, sauce, toppings! Soooo many choices! So excited they‚Äôre in our area now!

name: Anthony Maldonado
text: Great concept! Food was made super fast. Quality Ingredients

name: Jaclyn Freeman
text: I love Blaze pizza! My pizza is great every time I go! The staff they have is always so nice. I highly recommend.

text: AWESOME service,  Sterling was so nice and patient. Visit 09/19/20...besides the good pizza people like Sterling would enhance my visits . Keep up the good work

text: SAD EXPERIENCE - Was super excited to eat Blaze pizza on a Saturday afternoon (July 25, 2020). First time trying the chain. The restaurant is set up similarly to chipotle, where you order ‚ÄúAssembly Line‚Äù style. Got to the end after paying, ‚Ä¶More

text: Another great experience at Blaze Pizza. The staff was great, the service was really great, and the pizza was really, really great. Thanks Blaze.

name: Mike Fish
text: I love the selection! The half pizza half salad was perfect for lunch today. Def coming back to try the new spicy chicken pizza!!

name: Taylor Clayton
text: Oh my gosh you have to try their brownies..... yummmm!! And the 1/2 pizza, 1/2 salad was pretty good too! lol. Seriously though. great food. love the industrial look inside. def going back!

name: angelina phillips
text: Best pizza place in town!! The ingredients are fresh and the service is outstanding!!

name: Elisa Grossman
text: How dissatisfied and disappointing my first experience had been. I have LOVED everything I have had at the variety of Blaze locations around the country until now! I have been waiting over an hour for 3- 11 in pizzas! I fully expect to be refunded for my meal but my husband will not ask!

name: Rene Herteux
text: I showed up about 12:30 on a Saturday and there was a line out the door.  Social distancing was enforced all the way up to the point where you place your order then it went out the window.  I noticed that most of the patrons dining in the ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyle Rodgers
text: Great staff and delicious food! A quick and fun pizza joint

name: Chris Mandich
text: We love blaze pizza. started when we found them in Gainesville, then Sarasota. Now open close to home. great value amazing food. thank you for opening here.

name: Jake Tuckey
text: Pretty good pizza for fast food style pizza place. Wish the owners would have used my company for their window film because the company they used destroyed their nice new windows.

name: Marya Cas

name: Thomas Dellinger
text: Tried the new Blaze pizza in FM I got the take 2 1/2 Pizza and 4 Dough knots.  Pizza had garlic pesto sauce ham, pepperoni, bacon, banana peppers, black olives, onion, oregano, and mozzarella. ‚Ä¶More

text:
Cut the time in half for the pizza to be prepared

text: Made to order thin crisp pizza, garlic  mozzarella filled bread knots. Casual, clean.

name: Ethan Cameron
text: If i could give no stars i would. they gave me a burnt pizza and then when i complained they gave me a free desert as comp. these guys clearly don‚Äôt care about the customers. i‚Äôm super disappointed cause i heard so much good about it but they‚Äôre terrible.

Every experience I've had at this location has

name: Collins Cogan

1. Pizza is not cut straight, not even close

text: Not bad, but not great.  With so many options for really good pizza - even really good vegan pizza - in the Fort Myers area, we likely won't be back.

text: First time I tried after they opened pizza was cold barely had any sauce or cheese.. I let it go because they had just open.. Went there again yesterday same exact thing cold  pizza and very slack on the toppings.. Very disappointing..

text: Pepperoni pizza for curbside special has hardly any pepperoni.  Bottom was burned.  I love Blaze, this location just needs improvement.
